generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and crosswalks, which is the main surface for vehicle travel.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the right side of the road, separated by a curb and bordered by parked cars and trees.
- building: Multi-story residential buildings are visible on the left side of the road.
- vegetation: Numerous trees and green bushes are present along both sides of the road and in front of the buildings.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible through the tree canopy, appearing overcast.
- car: Several cars are parked along the right side of the road, and one black car is driving on the left side.
- pole: A tall, grey metal pole is visible on the right side of the road, near the parked cars.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible in the distance, hanging above the road.
- traffic sign: A small traffic sign is visible on a pole on the right side of the road.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road, near the parked cars.
